hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #a Zora Tunic# can be found in #Kakariko Village#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Red Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Blue Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Fire Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Bow#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found on #the Death Mountain Trail#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #the Nocturne of Shadow#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Zelda's Lullaby# can be found at #Lake Hylia#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: Try using various items and weapons on me :)

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Piece of Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #a Bow# can be found in #the Market#.
